survey.title: YOUR OPINION IS NEEDED
survey.description: Tucson will soon have before its City Council a proposed new law relative to smoking in restaurants and we need your opinion. We want to serve you best and we would appreciate your taking a few moments to let us know what's on your mind.

questions.question: Do we need a new city ordinance enforceable with a fine to seek social courtesy and good smoking manners?
Is it best to encourage personal courtesy and thoughtfulness among the customers in Tucson without the sanction of further laws and prosecution?
Today, have you personally experienced any discomfort by the smoking public in this establishment?

additional_info.name: Name (Your Option)
additional_info.instructions: Please present this to the cashier or leave it at your table. Thank you for being of assistance to us.
additional_info.note: We need more cards filled out for broad consensus and for final report to City Council.
